sentences.english: Stellite 6 seating faces for long service life.
sentences.chinese: 钨铬钴合金6阀座面，使用寿命更长。

sentences.english: Some methods of retained austenite measurement on high chromium cast iron were compared.
sentences.chinese: 对高铬铸铁残余奥氏体测定的几种方法进行了比较。

sentences.english: Hexavalent Chrome Cr-VI when used as a passivate.
sentences.chinese: 作为钝化使用的六价铬。

sentences.english: Polished chrome and sand nickel are available.
sentences.chinese: 备有光铬，沙镍两种颜色。

sentences.english: The determination of copper in high-content chromium ore is investigated.
sentences.chinese: 研究高铬矿中铜的测定方法。

sentences.english: Eutectic composition should be adopted for high-Cr white cast iron used under high-stress impact abrasion condition.
sentences.chinese: 高应力冲击磨料磨损时，高铬白口铸铁应选共晶成分。
焊接连接阀座采用钨铬钴合金6阀座面。

sentences.english: Swallow 200 micrograms a day of chromium polynicotinate.
sentences.chinese: 每天吞食200毫克的烟酸铬。

sentences.english: The chromium in industrial wastewater could be removed with the scrap-iron fixed bed reactor.
sentences.chinese: 采用铁屑固定床反应器去除工业废水中的铬。

sentences.english: A black chromium plating process was advanced.
sentences.chinese: 介绍了一种镀黑铬工艺。

sentences.english: Hexavalent chromium (Cr-VI) in chromate conversion coatings as surface treatment.
sentences.chinese: 表面处理用铬酸盐转化涂层中的六价铬。

sentences.english: A-1L-AJ bricks on outlet are more than two times of imported Mg-Cr bricks in service life.
sentences.chinese: AJ用在闪速炉放出口比进口镁铬砖高出一倍还多。

sentences.english: Hexavalent chromium and cadmium have also been eliminated from the list of materials.
sentences.chinese: 六价铬和镉也已消灭的材料清单。

sentences.english: The instrumental neutron activation analysis was used to determine Cr content in chromium-rich yeast cells.
sentences.chinese: 利用中子活化分析法对富铬酵母中的铬进行了测定。
